name: Shark Revolution New
description:
Shark Revolution New is an Adventure in the underwater world will certainly carry your children and bring a joy. The game Shark Revolution New is a colorful game that develops attention, fine motor skills, logic and concentration.
Shark Revolution New is a funny game for toddlers which you can download or get absolutely free.
Download the game and help the amusing hungry shark in the hunt for a variety of fish. In the underwater world there are many obstacles that need to be overcome if you want to catch your lunch!
Over time, the level of complexity of the game increases, your shark is gaining strength and begins to swim faster.
A nice shark invites you to an underwater adventure and hopes that it will not remain hungry!
Regardless of whether you play this game for relaxation or want to test your abilities in the feeding Shark - in any case, you will get great pleasure.

Good luck!
